metadata.title: CVE-2019-20352 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: In Netwide Assembler (NASM) 2.15rc0, a heap-based buffer over-read occurs (via a crafted .asm file) in set_text_free when called from expand_one_smacro in asm/preproc.c.

criterions.comment: nasm package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.15.04-1').
